Job Title: Inventory Control Clerk

Location: Springfield, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
EnerSys is the global leader in stored energy solutions for industrial applications. We have over thirty manufacturing and assembly plants worldwide servicing over 10,000 customers in more than 100 countries. Worldwide headquarters are located in Reading, PA, USA with regional headquarters in Europe and Asia. We complement our extensive line of Motive Power and Energy Systems with a full range of integrated services and systems. With sales and service locations throughout the world, and over 100 years of battery experience, EnerSys is the power/full solution for stored DC power products.

Job Purpose

Learn More About Our Company

Perform material handling to assist with the control and management of inventory to ensure that inventory accuracy, flexibility, and integrity. Ensure manufacturing has materials required to complete orders.

Essential Duties And Responsibilities

Locate products in appropriate shelves, overstock, or storage.Participate in daily and annual cycle counts and report findings to Team Lead.Assist receiving specialist with the Offload of incoming trucks and ensure parts are placed in the correct bin locations once received as instructed by the receiving specialistAssist in maintaining the security and safety of the Company's warehouse.Perform warehouse maintenance activities; keeping warehouse clean and organized, identifying obsolete materials, relabeling, repackaging, etc.Use ERP system to investigate inventory movements and look up parts as needed.Take initiative to identify and research incorrect parts and inventory problems.Restock parts as needed.Complete and submit all paperwork (cycle counts, pick sheets, etc.) in a timely and accurate manner.Operate forklift, pallet jacks, and other tools and equipment to move materials.Support continuous improvement efforts with the team and promote healthy, respectful communications.Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.

Qualifications

Minimum 1-2 years related materials or inventory experience preferred.Basic understanding of Lean manufacturing, and ISO quality procedures.Ability to obtain forklift certification within 30 days of hire required.Working knowledge of cycle counting, KanBan, FIFO, and general inventory management preferred.Basic knowledge of MS Word, Excel, and enterprise resource planning system (such as SAP) preferred

General Job Requirements

Generic
